snippet: Aides to Senator Rand Paul are seeking a statute clarification that would allow him to run both for re-election and for president.
abstract: Supporters of Kentucky Sen Rand Paul are backing a bill in the state's Legislature that would allow him to appear more than once on the ballot, preparing for possibility that he may run for president in 2016 while seeking re-election to the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Aides to Senator Rand Paul are seeking a statute clarification that would allow him to run both for re-election and for president.

headline.main: Spurred by Paul, Kentucky Weighs Change to Ballot Rule
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Bill With Rand Paul in Mind Would Allow Multiple Candidacies
